Articles.Content:
KSP Version:

Steam 0.90.0 Beta, Windows 32-bit, build id = 00705 2014-12-15_13-42-05 Branch: master

What Happens:

When I build a craft in SPH with more than 200 parts, the game goes corrupted and can't work on that craft anymore. I reinstalled the game again. The problem persist. I did it four times and four times the game fail.

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock , no mods in gamedata folder.

- Images Link:

1.- I can not pick up the pieces. The side menu disappears, and the flag changes.https://www.dropbox.com/s/wauawk4pr85aj53/2015-02-03_00001.jpg?dl=0

2.- The info bottomworks.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/milsixq85fcfsdc/2015-02-03_00002.jpg?dl=0

3.- If I try to launch it, everything stops working. The file is corrupt and I have to start from scratch.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/tung66ctxiuxx6v/2015-02-03_00003.jpg?dl=0

- Craft File: 217parts. Corrupted.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/f8vec7sd80psf9w/saves.7z?dl=0

- Log File:

PCspec: https://www.dropbox.com/s/vyot0ry8sbluobo/DxDiag.txt?dl=0

Game log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rl8jro52nhg3b5k/KSP.log?dl=0

Edited February 3, 2015 by sa1vi

I lost a 800 parts rocket for the same problem, I deleted manually all struts and fuel lines from the .craft and everything went back to normal.

I deleted struts, fuel lines and flying rcs tanks from your craft and now it's fine https://www.dropbox.com/s/n8k67npzxakxp8g/H%20Apache%20Rebuild.craft?dl=0

To be clear, I don't know why this method works, I just do it

I lost a 800 parts rocket for the same problem, I deleted manually all struts and fuel lines from the .craft and everything went back to normal.

I deleted struts, fuel lines and flying rcs tanks from your craft and now it's fine https://www.dropbox.com/s/n8k67npzxakxp8g/H%20Apache%20Rebuild.craft?dl=0

To be clear, I don't know why this method works, I just do it

Thank you very much Alberto!!! Next time IÃ‚Â´ll do the same. Now I regret having deleted the above crafts, I'm idiot.

Remember also to delete links from other parts: https://i.imgur.com/C6wp77L.png

Edited February 3, 2015 by Alberto De Beni

Remember also to delete links from other parts: https://i.imgur.com/C6wp77L.png

I finished to build the helicopter with some usual game crashes that sent me to desktop, but no corruption in the craft. Your system works !!!

I'll remember to delete links from other parts, thanks you!!.

I lost a 800 parts rocket for the same problem, I deleted manually all struts and fuel lines from the .craft and everything went back to normal.

I deleted struts, fuel lines and flying rcs tanks from your craft and now it's fine https://www.dropbox.com/s/n8k67npzxakxp8g/H%20Apache%20Rebuild.craft?dl=0

To be clear, I don't know why this method works, I just do it

please help me I have the exact same problem and i don't know how to fix it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109322-Part-menu-not-showing-in-SPH

Thank you,
